sentence: "Instead of focusing on kitchen-table issues like strengthening the economy and investing in education, Doug Mastriano is an extremist running on a dangerous agenda that would devastate Pennsylvania families," Democrat Governors Association executive director Noam Lee said.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Fetterman takes Pennsylvania Dem Senate nomination despite stroke, as GOP race too close to call

sentence: His advice to Mr. Oz is also a warning about how Doug Mastriano, the GOPs gubernatorial nominee, might react to a loss in the fall.
author: The Editorial Board
title: Welcome to Stop the Steal, 2022

sentence: The Republican nominee for governor in Pennsylvania, Doug Mastriano, won his race on the strength of his enthusiastic support for Donald Trumps effort to subvert and overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.
title: Its Trumps Party, and Hell Lie if He Wants To
